thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 6 of 287
thread.title: Jeffrey Foster
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Jeffrey Foster

author: Jeffrey Foster
title: Jeffrey Foster
text: From start to finish my loan took a little longer than I expected due to a few issues on my end. The quicken team did great on working thru them all to still get me what they said at the rate expected. The online process was great with great communication between the team. I would recommend Quicken to everyone.
